metadata.title: CVE-2024-22913 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-buffer-overflow was found in SWFTools v0.9.2, in the functionswf5lex at lex.swf5.c:1321. It allows an attacker to cause code execution.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
